title: If there is no data for a series, a friendly error message should be displayed
description: When there is no data available for a series, the application should display a user-friendly error message to notify the user of the issue.
OB: Currently, when there is no data for a series, no error message is displayed and the user is not informed about the issue.
EB: When there is no data for a series, a friendly error message should be displayed to notify the user of the issue.
SR:
1. Launch the application.
2. Navigate to the page displaying the series data.
3. Ensure that there is no data available for the series being viewed.
4. Verify that a user-friendly error message is displayed to notify the user about the lack of data for the series.
